clean_data: Software Engineer span lSoftwarespan Engineer Software Engineer Saratoga Springs NY Seasoned technologist with over ten years of experience fulfilling diverse business demands in entrepreneurial environments as well as worldclass companies such as Nielsen Gracenote Inc Xerox Corp and the NFL Known for operating a highly efficient team passionate about delivering effective technical solutions Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Software Engineer Transfinder Schenectady NY August 2018 to June 2019 Web and mobile application development on iOS and Android platforms for school transportation and map routing solutions As as one of the more senior engineers my duties include code reviews git merge request and release management in addition to the ordinary development responsibilities of each engineer Technologies Used Git HTML CSS3 JavaScript ES6 Typescript Angular 7 NodeJs Grunt NET Apache Cordova Software Engineer SportsHub Technologies Remote June 2018 to January 2019 As a frontend developer I built fantasy sports games and community features for the daily fantasy sports site Fanballcom Primarily I built an auction engine with VueJS and Pusher PubSub which let 6 owners bid on a pool of players 4 at a time See a demonstration here httpswwwyoutubecomwatchvtR6WdIZhTIt530 Technologies Used Git HTML CSS3 JavaScript ES6 VueJS NodeJs Grunt Software Engineer Gracenote Inc Queensbury NY January 2015 to June 2018 Managed a team of three engineers who produced a sports and TV metadata product called OnEntertinament Sports which was presented at CES in 2016 and makes about 2 million a year for Gracenote The platform uses Ruby scripts to ingest raw sports data hits an API built with Groovy and publishes processed data to a Kafka queue where it populates a Mashery API Designed and developed an editorial interface for our internal sports data using AngularJS and Ruby on Rails Its Javascript dependencies were managed with npm and bower The sass style sheets and javascript files were compiled and minified using grunt tasks Resources were provisioned and deployed to AWS using ansible Technologies Used Git HTML CSS3 JavaScript AngularJS Ruby on Rails AWS Ansible NodeJs Grunt Kafka Application Developer Xerox Litigation Services Albany NY September 2013 to January 2015 Served on the team who designed and implemented a complete user interface redesign for the companys flagship eDiscovery platform We also implemented bandwidth saving asset compilation improving page load speeds by 30 Technologies Used HTML CSS JS ReactJS PHP Oracle CoFounder Five1Eight Internet Media LLC Albany NY 2011 to 2013 Designed and developed a playmoney sports wagering platform that simulated a sports gaming experience The product also kept our users informed with blogs news stats and schedules for every pro and Division1 college team in North America Technologies Used HTML CSS JavaScript jQuery Ruby on Rails MySQL AWS Application Developer Sports Technologies LLC Collinsville CT 2009 to 2012 Designed developed and supported fantasy sports games and content publishing platforms for worldclass brands in sports and media interfacing with major social media networks In 2010 my work was nominated for a Sports Emmy Technologies Used HTML CSS JavaScript jQuery Ruby on Rails NodeJS MySQL AWS IT Specialist New York State New York NY 2004 to 2009 Designed and Developing Web applications with Adobe ColdFusion for internal and public use for the Department of Civil Service and the Office of the Attorney General Technologies Used HTML CSS JavaScript ColdFusion Oracle Education Bachelor of Computer Science Siena College Loudonville NY 2000 to 2004 Skills Javascript MySQL Git Javascript jQuery MySQL HTML 5 Awards 2010 Sports Emmy Nominee 2010 2010 Sports Emmy Nominee for Outstanding New Approaches Sports Programming for work on NFLcom Weekly Countdown Groups Vice President Saratoga Wilton Youth Baseball January 2016 to Present Executive Board member and Information Coordinator for the 501c3 nonprofit youth baseball organization Additional Information Gigs Side Projects BoltDraftcom Freelance Ruby on Rails Developer for the fastest Daily Fantasy Sports Contest on the Web Footballcom Author of a biweekly Fantasy Football editorial column
